trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [divisor v] to [2] ask [Enter a number to check if it's a prime number:] and wait set [number v] to (answer) if <<(number) = [1]> or <(number) < [1]>> then say (join (number) [ is not a prime number.]) else repeat until <(divisor) = (number)> if <((number) mod (divisor)) = [0]> then say (join (number) [ is not a prime number.]) stop [this script v] end change [divisor v] by (1) end say (join (number) [ is a prime number.]) end

when green flag clicked set [is prime v] to [true] set [divisor v] to [2] ask [Enter a number to check if it's a prime number:] and wait set [number v] to (answer) if <<(number) = [1]> or <(number) < [1]>> then say (join (number) [ is not a prime number.]) else repeat until <<(is prime) = [false]> or <(divisor) = (number)>> if <((number) mod (divisor)) = [0]> then set [is prime v] to [false] say (join (number) [ is not a prime number.]) end change [divisor v] by (1) end if <(is prime) = [true]> then say (join (number) [ is a prime number.]) end end
